description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Step aside, 8-bit, and make way for 1-bit. Are you a bad enough dude to jump and shoot across three large, treacherous worlds in a bid for the title of "world's hardest game"? You'll have to think fast, shoot fast, and move fast in order to stand a chance. Features an awesome soundtrack by Terry L. Williams that'll rock your socks off.
